name: Tresorit Kft
goal: Tresorit is a highly secure yet user-friendly file sync & sharing service. Its mission is to enable people work safely knowing that their data is secure and their privacy is respected.
interests: Consumers, Digital economy and society, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives:
The EU legislative proposals that are of interest to Tresorit are the ones impacting users' digital rights, data protection, privacy policies, and encryption:
General Data Protection Regulation
Cybersecurity
e-evidence
ePrivacy reform
Encryption
Free flow of data
Data economy
International Data Transfers
Legislation on Data Retention
Telecoms Single Market
